sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭在通訊和信息技術方面的投資可謂恰逢其時。

sentences.english: Can Albertsons Trounce Wal-Mart with Advanced Information Technology?
sentences.chinese: 可以艾伯森痛打沃爾瑪先進的信息技術沃爾瑪？

sentences.english: Beijing New Web Digital Information Technology Company declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 北京新網數字信息技術公司拒絕就此事做出評論。

sentences.english: A: I have eight years of experience working in the IT industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在信息技術行業已經有八年的工作經驗了。

sentences.english: It is indubitable that he is an elite in information technology.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，他是信息技術界的精英。

sentences.english: It is necessity for us to use IT applicative pattern in accountant teaching.
sentences.chinese: 採用信息技術應用模式是會計教學的必然選擇。

sentences.english: Many people think that information technology and biotechnology will rule the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲，信息技術和生物工程學將主宰21世紀。

sentences.english: Information-technology (IT) firms have identified smart systems as the next big thing.
sentences.chinese: 信息技術企業將智能系統列爲下一個大事件。

sentences.english: Shanghai TYDIC Information Technology Co. , Ltd. was established.
sentences.chinese: 上海天緣迪柯信息技術有限公司成立。

sentences.english: The information technology already permeated the modern business management each quoin.
sentences.chinese: 信息技術已經滲入到現代企業管理的每個角落。

sentences.english: As a result, the ethos of the information technology industry changed.
sentences.chinese: 這一切改變了信息技術產業的精神風貌。

sentences.english: This system has been successfully operated in Guizhou Yi-Ming Information Technology Limited Company.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已經在貴州佚名信息技術有限公司成功運行。

sentences.english: Modern information technologies have a huge influence on studies nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 現代信息技術對當今的學習產生了巨大的影響。

sentences.english: TYDIC Hefei Information Technology Co. , Ltd. was established.
sentences.chinese: 合肥天源迪科信息技術有限公司成立。

sentences.english: It can be the most advanced initiation system with development of information technology.
sentences.chinese: 隨着信息技術的發展，它將成爲最先進的起爆系統。

sentences.english: Beijing FoneNet Information Technology Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 北京風網信息技術有限公司。

definition: public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
